1.title: Arkansas Wild Hog
1.plot: Eric and Mauzner head to Warren, Arkansas to hunt for meals made with an animal considered a pest and a local delicacy: wild hog. Dishes include: pulled hog sandwich, molested hog, hog in cherry sauce, and whole smoked hog with "squealer dust" rub.

2.title: Texas Gar
2.plot: Eric & Mauzner head to south Texas, in search of the best way to cook a prehistoric fish that people seem to either love or hate: alligator gar. Dishes include: fried gar balls, "grumbo", smoked gar, bacon-wrapped gar balls, and grilled gar steaks.

3.title: Mississippi Wild Turkey
3.plot: Eric & Mauzner head to Tunica, MS on the hunt for meals made with the wild cousin of a bird that most of us eat in sandwiches or on Thanksgiving... the Wild Turkey. Dishes include: Smoked Wild Turkey with Pineapple & Sundried Tomatoes, Wild Turkey Fingers, Bang Bang Turkey, Blackened Wild Turkey w/ Cheese Grits and a Sweet & Sour Gastrique, and Butter Poached Wild Turkey with a Wild Turkey Confit, and Cranberry & Hot Dog Bun Bread Pudding.

4.title: Louisiana Crawfish
4.plot: Eric & Mauzner head to Breaux Bridge, LA on the hunt for meals made with a critter that is almost uniquely associated with Cajun Cuisine... the Crawfish. Dishes include: "Crawfish" Beignets, Crawfish Bisque w/ Baked Stuffed Crawfish Heads, and the World's Best Crawfish Boil.

5.title: Arkansas Buffallo
5.plot: Eric and Mauzner head to Jasper, Arkansas on the hunt for meals made with an animal that is quintessentially American ... bison. Dishes include: biscuits with buffalo gravy; buffalo meatloaf, and chicken-fried buffalo.

6.title: Louisiana Goat
6.plot: Eric & Mauzner head to Cajun Country, LA, to experience the Acadian tradition of sustainability, by honoring an animal that provides milk, cheese and meat...the goat. Dishes include: Goat Cheese with Apples, Goat Sausage, Goat Burgers with a Tzatziki Slaw, and Whole Roasted Goat Flambéed with Sugar Cane Vinegar

imdb.plot outline: Los Angeles chef & restaurateur Eric Greenspan is hitting the road with his best friend Captain Mauzner to find the best meat dishes in America. They're hunting, cooking and eating authentic American food served up by the people who know it best.
imdb.title: Eric Greenspan Is Hungry
plot: Los Angeles chef & restaurateur Eric Greenspan is hitting the road with his best friend Captain Mauzner to find the best meat dishes in America. They're hunting, cooking and eating authentic American food served up by the people who know it best.
